SEÇKİN OLMAMA RAĞMEN BELLİ EDEN DE GİZLİ KULLANAN ÇOK HİLE VAR ONUN DIŞINDA RATE AYARLARI VS YAPARAK ÇOK DAHA İYİ OYNAYABİLİRSİNİZ GÜZEL OYUN BİR SIKINTI SUNUCU FARKI ADAMIN KAFASINA SIKMAMA RAĞMEN HASAR YEMİYOR GÜZEL OYUN TAVSİYE EDERİM SEÇKİN ALMANIZ ÇOK İŞE YARAR

This game heavily portrays Seal Team 6 and how they are able to defuse bombs in real time and puts the player into an immersive reality of how a real spec-ops soldier would feel in the situation of defusing a bomb and fighting terrorists. The addition of voice chat although being very helpful for callouts that can help with the game also has no filters which can further represent the fear in war. However the game is full of very unrealistic physics.
